ps1.5:1.4_0: Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho—
ps1.5:2.2_0: suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.3_0: ajjhattavuṭṭhāno vimokkho, bahiddhāvuṭṭhāno vimokkho, dubhato vuṭṭhāno vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.7_1: ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti vimokkho,
ps1.5:3.2_0: Idha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati—
ps1.5:4.2_0: Idha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati—
ps1.5:5.2_0: Idha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati—
ps1.5:9.3_0: Sakadāgāmimaggo oḷārikā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti,
ps1.5:9.4_0: Anāgāmimaggo anusahagatā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti,
ps1.5:9.5_0: Arahattamaggo rūparāgā arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā vuṭṭhāti,
ps1.5:10.2_0: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca,
ps1.5:10.4_0: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca—
ps1.5:11.2_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca,
ps1.5:11.4_0: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca—
ps1.5:12.1_0: Katame dubhato vuṭṭhānānaṁ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā?
ps1.5:12.6_0: ime dubhato vuṭṭhānānaṁ anulomā cattāro vimokkhā.
ps1.5:13.2_0: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā, dutiyassa jhānassa …pe…
ps1.5:13.4_0: catutthassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā—
ps1.5:14.2_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā paṭilābho vā vipāko vā, viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā …pe…
ps1.5:16.2_0: Idhekacco ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ nīlanimittaṁ manasikaroti, nīlasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:16.3_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.4_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā bahiddhā nīlanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati,
ps1.5:16.5_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.6_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:16.8_0: “ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca ubhayamidaṁ rūpan”ti, rūpasaññī hoti.
ps1.5:16.12_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.13_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā bahiddhā odātanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati,
ps1.5:16.14_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:16.15_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:16.17_0: “ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca ubhayamidaṁ rūpan”ti, rūpasaññī hoti.
ps1.5:17.1_0: Kathaṁ ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti—vimokkho?
ps1.5:17.2_0: Idhekacco ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ nīlanimittaṁ na manasikaroti, nīlasaññaṁ na paṭilabhati;
ps1.5:17.3_0: bahiddhā nīlanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati, nīlasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:17.4_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:17.5_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:17.10_0: odātanimittaṁ na manasikaroti, odātasaññaṁ na paṭilabhati;
ps1.5:17.11_0: bahiddhā odātanimitte cittaṁ upasaṁharati, odātasaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:17.12_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ karoti, sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāreti, svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpeti.
ps1.5:17.13_0: So taṁ nimittaṁ suggahitaṁ katvā sūpadhāritaṁ upadhāretvā svāvatthitaṁ avatthāpetvā āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
ps1.5:17.16_0: Evaṁ ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti—
ps1.5:18.2_0: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
ps1.5:18.2_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
ps1.5:18.8_0: Upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati …pe…
ps1.5:19.2_0: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā
ps1.5:20.2_0: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma “anantaṁ viññāṇan”ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:21.2_0: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma “natthi kiñcī”ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:22.2_0: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:23.2_0: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:24.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:25.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:26.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:27.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:28.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:29.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:30.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:31.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:32.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:33.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:36.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:37.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:37.5_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:38.2_0: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā …pe…
ps1.5:39.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:40.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:41.2_0: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca—
ps1.5:42.2_0: Cattāri ca jhānāni, catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo—
ps1.5:43.2_0: Siyā eko saññāvimokkho dasa saññāvimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:44.22_0: Evaṁ siyā eko saññāvimokkho dasa saññāvimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:44.22_1: dasa saññāvimokkhā eko saññāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:45.5_0: Evaṁ siyā eko saññāvimokkho dasa saññāvimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:45.5_1: dasa saññāvimokkhā eko saññāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:46.10_2: dasa saññāvimokkhā eko saññāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena—
ps1.5:47.2_0: Siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:47.2_1: dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:47.4_0: Aniccānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ niccato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.6_0: Dukkhānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ sukhato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.8_0: Anattānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ attato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.10_0: Nibbidānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ nandiyā sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.12_0: Virāgānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ rāgato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.14_0: Nirodhānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ samudayato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.16_0: Paṭinissaggānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ ādānato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.18_0: Animittānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ nimittato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.20_0: Appaṇihitānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṇidhiyā sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.22_0: Suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:47.24_0: Evaṁ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:47.24_1: dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:48.1_0: Rūpe aniccānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ niccato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:48.3_0: rūpe suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:48.5_0: Evaṁ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:48.5_1: dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:49.6_0: jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ niccato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:49.8_0: jarāmaraṇe suññatānupassanā yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ abhinivesato sammohā aññāṇā muccatīti—
ps1.5:49.10_0: Evaṁ siyā eko ñāṇavimokkho dasa ñāṇavimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:49.10_1: dasa ñāṇavimokkhā eko ñāṇavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena—
ps1.5:50.2_0: Siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:50.2_1: dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:50.4_0: Aniccānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ niccato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.6_0: Dukkhānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ sukhato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.8_0: Anattānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ attato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.10_0: Nibbidānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ nandiyā santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.12_0: Virāgānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ rāgato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.14_0: Nirodhānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ samudayato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.16_0: Paṭinissaggānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ ādānato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.18_0: Animittānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ nimittato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.20_0: Appaṇihitānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ paṇidhiyā santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.22_0: Suññatānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ abhinivesato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:50.24_0: Evaṁ siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:50.24_1: dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:51.1_0: Rūpe aniccānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ niccato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:51.3_0: rūpe suññatānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ abhinivesato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:51.5_0: Evaṁ siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:51.5_1: dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:52.6_0: jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ niccato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.8_0: jarāmaraṇe suññatānupassanā anuttaraṁ sītibhāvañāṇaṁ abhinivesato santāpapariḷāhadarathā muccatīti—
ps1.5:52.10_0: Evaṁ siyā eko sītisiyāvimokkho dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:52.10_1: dasa sītisiyāvimokkhā eko sītisiyāvimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena—
ps1.5:53.34_0: Jhāte ca jhāpe ca jānātīti—jhānavimokkho—ayaṁ jhānavimokkho.
ps1.5:54.2_0: Siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:54.2_1: dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:54.24_0: Evaṁ siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:54.24_1: dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:55.5_0: Evaṁ siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:55.5_1: dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:56.10_0: Evaṁ siyā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā honti,
ps1.5:56.10_1: dasa anupādācittassa vimokkhā eko anupādācittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:61.1_0: Tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.5:61.2_0: Sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato samanupassanatāya animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
ps1.5:61.2_1: sabbasaṅkhāresu manosamuttejanatāya appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
ps1.5:61.2_2: sabbadhamme parato samanupassanatāya suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya—
ps1.5:63.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:63.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:63.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:65.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti,
ps1.5:65.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti,
ps1.5:65.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti,
ps1.5:65.4_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa saddhindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti.
ps1.5:65.9_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa samādhindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti.
ps1.5:65.14_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa paññindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti.
ps1.5:66.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:66.7_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:66.13_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:67.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa saddhindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti.
ps1.5:67.8_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa samādhindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti.
ps1.5:67.15_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa paññindriyaṁ ādhipateyyaṁ hoti.
ps1.5:70.9_0: Jhānaphassaṁ paṭhamaṁ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikarotīti—
ps1.5:70.11_0: “Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodho”ti ñātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāyāti—
ps1.5:70.13_3: siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena siyāti.
ps1.5:70.21_0: Evaṁ ime tayo puggalā saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimuttā.
ps1.5:71.7_0: Evaṁ ime tayo puggalā samādhindriyassa vasena kāyasakkhī.
ps1.5:72.7_0: Evaṁ ime tayo puggalā paññindriyassa vasena diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:73.1_3: evaṁ siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:73.2_0: Yo cāyaṁ puggalo saddhāvimutto, yo ca kāyasakkhī, yo ca diṭṭhippatto, siyā ime tayo puggalā …pe…
ps1.5:73.3_0: aññoyeva saddhāvimutto, añño kāyasakkhī, añño diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:74.9_3: evaṁ siyā ime tayo puggalā saddhāvimuttāpi kāyasakkhīpi diṭṭhippattāpi vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
ps1.5:74.10_0: Aññoyeva saddhāvimutto, añño kāyasakkhī, añño diṭṭhippatto.
ps1.5:75.5_0: Saddhindriyassa vasena catunnaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.5:75.6_0: Ye hi keci saddhindriyassa vasena sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhanti, sabbe te saddhānusārino.
ps1.5:76.5_0: Saddhindriyassa vasena cattārindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.5:76.6_0: Yehi keci saddhindriyassa vasena sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikatā, sabbe te saddhāvimuttā.
ps1.5:77.11_0: Saddhindriyassa vasena cattārindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.5:77.12_0: Yehi keci saddhindriyassa vasena arahattaṁ sacchikatā, sabbe te saddhāvimuttā.
ps1.5:78.5_0: Samādhindriyassa vasena catunnaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.5:78.6_0: Ye hi keci samādhindriyassa vasena sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhanti, sabbe te kāyasakkhī.
ps1.5:79.11_0: Samādhindriyassa vasena cattārindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.5:79.12_0: Ye hi keci samādhindriyassa vasena arahattaṁ sacchikatā, sabbe te kāyasakkhī.
ps1.5:80.6_0: Paññindriyassa vasena catunnaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.5:80.7_0: Ye hi keci paññindriyassa vasena sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhanti, sabbe te dhammānusārino.
ps1.5:81.6_0: Paññindriyassa vasena cattārindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.5:81.7_0: Ye hi keci paññindriyassa vasena sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikatā, sabbe te diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:82.10_0: Paññindriyassa vasena cattārindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.5:82.11_0: Ye hi keci paññindriyassa vasena arahattaṁ sacchikatā, sabbe te diṭṭhippattā.
ps1.5:83.1_0: Ye hi keci nekkhammaṁ bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_1: adhigatā vā adhigacchanti vā adhigamissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_2: pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_3: paṭiladdhā vā paṭilabhanti vā paṭilabhissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_4: paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_5: sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_6: phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_7: vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_8: pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:83.1_9: vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_0: ye hi keci aṭṭha vimokkhe bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_1: adhigatā vā adhigacchanti vā adhigamissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_2: pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_3: paṭiladdhā vā paṭilabhanti vā paṭilabhissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_4: paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_5: sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_6: phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_7: vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:85.8_8: vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:86.1_0: Ye hi keci catasso paṭisambhidā pattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā …pe…
ps1.5:87.1_0: Ye hi keci tisso vijjā paṭividdhā vā paṭivijjhanti vā paṭivijjhissanti vā …pe…
ps1.5:88.1_0: Ye hi keci tisso sikkhā sikkhitā vā sikkhanti vā sikkhissanti vā,
ps1.5:88.1_1: sacchikatā vā sacchikaronti vā sacchikarissanti vā,
ps1.5:88.1_2: phassitā vā phassanti vā phassissanti vā,
ps1.5:88.1_3: vasippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:88.1_4: pāramippattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:88.1_5: vesārajjappattā vā pāpuṇanti vā pāpuṇissanti vā,
ps1.5:89.1_0: Ye hi keci dukkhaṁ parijānanti samudayaṁ pajahanti nirodhaṁ sacchikaronti maggaṁ bhāventi,
ps1.5:90.7_0: Imehi catūhākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimutto,
ps1.5:91.3_0: Navahākārehi saccappaṭivedho hoti, navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:91.7_0: Imehi navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhāvimutto,
ps1.5:93.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:93.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:93.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto kiṁ bahulaṁ cittaṁ hoti?
ps1.5:94.1_0: Aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo katamaṁ vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhati?
ps1.5:94.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo katamaṁ vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhati?
ps1.5:94.3_0: Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo katamaṁ vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhati?
ps1.5:94.4_0: Aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo animittaṁ vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:94.5_0: Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:94.6_0: Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo suññataṁ vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
ps1.5:95.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:95.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:95.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:96.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:96.6_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:96.11_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:97.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:97.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:97.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:98.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:98.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:98.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:98.3_1: bhāvanāya dve vimokkhā tadanvayā honti sahajātapaccayā honti,
ps1.5:99.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:99.3_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:99.5_0: Anattato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:100.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:100.3_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto appaṇihito vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:100.5_0: Anattato manasikaroto suññato vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:101.9_0: Jhānaphassaṁ paṭhamaṁ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikarotīti—
ps1.5:101.11_0: “Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodho”ti viññātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāyāti—
ps1.5:101.13_0: ye hi keci nekkhammaṁ bhāvitā vā bhāventi vā bhāvissanti vā …pe…
ps1.5:103.5_0: Dukkhasaccaṁ pariññāpaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati, samudayasaccaṁ pahānapaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhati.
ps1.5:103.9_0: Imehi catūhākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimutto,
ps1.5:104.8_0: Imehi navahākārehi saccāni paṭivijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhāvimutto,
ps1.5:105.1_0: Aniccato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:105.3_0: Kathaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:105.5_0: Dukkhato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:105.7_0: Kathaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:105.9_0: Anattato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati?
ps1.5:105.11_0: Kathaṁ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti?
ps1.5:106.1_0: Aniccato manasikaronto nimittaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:106.4_0: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:106.6_0: Dukkhato manasikaronto pavattaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:106.9_0: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:106.11_0: Anattato manasikaronto nimittañca pavattañca yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati;
ps1.5:106.14_0: Evaṁ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps1.5:107.1_0: Yañca yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ yañca sammādassanaṁ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
ps1.5:107.1_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
ps1.5:107.2_0: Yañca yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇaṁ yañca sammādassanaṁ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
ps1.5:108.6_0: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:109.1_0: Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṁ yā ca nibbidā,
ps1.5:109.1_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
ps1.5:109.2_0: Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṁ yā ca nibbidā,
ps1.5:110.1_0: Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā,
ps1.5:110.1_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
ps1.5:110.2_0: Yā ca anattānupassanā yā ca suññatānupassanā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:111.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.4_0: Aniccato manasikaroto nimittaṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
ps1.5:111.5_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattaṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
ps1.5:111.6_0: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
ps1.5:112.1_0: Yā ca muccitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā,
ps1.5:112.1_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
ps1.5:112.2_0: Yā ca muccitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā,
ps1.5:113.1_0: Aniccato manasikaroto kuto cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṁ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.2_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto kuto cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṁ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.3_0: Anattato manasikaroto kuto cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, kattha cittaṁ pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.4_0: Aniccato manasikaroto nimittā cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, animitte cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:113.5_0: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattā cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti, appavatte cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:113.6_0: Anattato manasikaroto nimittā ca pavattā ca cittaṁ vuṭṭhāti,
ps1.5:113.6_1: animitte appavatte nirodhe nibbānadhātuyā cittaṁ pakkhandati.
ps1.5:114.1_0: Yā ca bahiddhāvuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā ye ca gotrabhū dhammā,
ps1.5:114.1_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
ps1.5:114.2_0: Yā ca bahiddhāvuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā ye ca gotrabhū dhammā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:116.1_0: Yā ca dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā yañca magge ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.5:116.1_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
ps1.5:116.2_0: Yā ca dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā yañca magge ñāṇaṁ, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṁ.
ps1.5:118.1_0: Katamehi catūhākārehi tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:118.3_0: Kathaṁ ādhipateyyaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:118.4_0: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:118.4_1: dukkhato manasikaroto appaṇihito vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti,
ps1.5:118.4_2: anattato manasikaroto suññato vimokkho ādhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:118.5_0: Evaṁ ādhipateyyaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:119.1_0: Kathaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:119.2_0: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti,
ps1.5:119.2_1: dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti,
ps1.5:119.2_2: anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
ps1.5:119.3_0: Evaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:120.1_0: Kathaṁ abhinīhāraṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:120.2_0: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ abhinīharati,
ps1.5:120.2_1: dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ abhinīharati,
ps1.5:120.2_2: anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena cittaṁ abhinīharati.
ps1.5:120.3_0: Evaṁ abhinīhāraṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:121.1_0: Kathaṁ niyyānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:121.2_0: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ niyyāti,
ps1.5:121.2_1: dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ niyyāti,
ps1.5:121.2_2: anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhassa vasena nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ niyyāti.
ps1.5:121.3_0: Evaṁ niyyānaṭṭhena tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:121.4_0: Imehi catūhākārehi tayo vimokkhā nānākkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:122.1_0: Katamehi sattahākārehi tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti?
ps1.5:122.3_0: Kathaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena
ps1.5:122.12_0: Evaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena
ps1.5:123.7_0: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na paṇidahatīti—
ps1.5:123.9_0: Evaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena
ps1.5:124.5_0: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na paṇidahatīti—
ps1.5:124.9_0: Evaṁ samodhānaṭṭhena adhigamanaṭṭhena paṭilābhaṭṭhena paṭivedhaṭṭhena sacchikiriyaṭṭhena phassanaṭṭhena
ps1.5:124.10_0: Imehi sattahākārehi tayo vimokkhā ekakkhaṇe honti.
ps1.5:126.2_0: Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho.
ps1.5:132.2_0: Ye tattha jātā anavajjakusalā bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, idaṁ mukhaṁ.
ps1.5:133.2_0: Yaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ nirodho nibbānaṁ, idaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ.
ps1.5:136.2_0: Saññāvivaṭṭo, cetovivaṭṭo, cittavivaṭṭo, ñāṇavivaṭṭo, vimokkhavivaṭṭo, saccavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:137.2_0: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo tattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo,
ps1.5:137.2_1: yattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:137.3_0: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo tattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo,
ps1.5:137.3_1: yattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:137.4_0: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo tattha saccavivaṭṭo,
ps1.5:137.4_1: yattha saccavivaṭṭo tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo.
ps1.5:139.2_0: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā,
ps1.5:139.2_1: dutiyassa jhānassa paṭilābho vā vipāko vā,
